alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 31 at 6:02AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tiyan Guam has issued a * Flood Advisory for Minor Flooding in Poor Drainage Areas for... Guam * Until 800 AM ChST. * At 559 AM ChST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain which will cause minor flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will result in minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to one inch of rain has already fallen. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dededo, Tamuning, Yigo, Mangilao, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Barrigada, Yona, Hagatna Heights, Andersen AFB, Talofofo, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Sinajana, Inarajan, Asan, Merizo, Piti, Santa Rita and Umatac. Additional rainfall of 1 to 2 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will make minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. A Flood Advisory means river or stream flows are elevated, or ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
